about.title: Who am I?
about.bio1: I'm a Software Engineer with over 5 years of experience, specialized in full-stack web development and passionate about creating innovative technological solutions.
about.bio2: My programming journey started early, and since then I've been constantly learning and adapting to new technologies and market trends.
